title: How to Clean a Bathroom Using Natural Products

steps.headline: Mix 1 part vinegar and 5 parts water in a spray bottle or bucket.
Spray or wipe onto porcelain, tile and chrome surfaces.
Let stand.
steps.description: Give time for vinegar to dissolve build up.

steps.headline: Scrub with cloth or sponge then rinse with water.
Sprinkle baking soda onto cloth or sponge and on stains.
Mix 1 part hydrogen peroxide and 10 parts water in spray bottle or bucket.
Spray or wipe onto all surfaces.
Let stand at least 5 to 10 minutes.

text: Mix 1 part vinegar and 5 parts water in a spray bottle or bucket.  Spray or wipe onto porcelain, tile and chrome surfaces.  Let stand. Give time for vinegar to dissolve build up. Scrub with cloth or sponge then rinse with water.  Sprinkle baking soda onto cloth or sponge and on stains.  Scrub then rinse. Repeat on problem areas. Mix 1 part hydrogen peroxide and 10 parts water in spray bottle or bucket.  Spray or wipe onto all surfaces.  Let stand at least 5 to 10 minutes.  Scrub and rinse.
